metadata.name: Lolbin Runexehelper Use As Proxy
metadata.comment: Detect usage of the "runexehelper.exe" binary as a proxy to launch other programs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\runexehelper.exe')))

output.summary: Detect usage of the "runexehelper.exe" binary as a proxy to launch other programs
